import React from 'react' import {Card,Icon,Label,Image} from 'semantic-ui-css' import moment from 'moment' import gql from 'graphql-tag'; function PostCard({post:{body, createdAt, id, username, likeCount, commentCount, likes}}){ return ( {username} {moment(createdAt).fromNow()} {body}
